name: Radiant Venusaur
author: Misa Tsutsui
flavor_text: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

abilities.name: Sunny Bloom
abilities.effect: Once at the end of your turn (after your attack), you may use this Ability. Draw cards until you have 4 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Pollen Hazard
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned, Confused, and Poisoned.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Radiant Pokémon in your deck.
